Title: Relates to the suspension of retirement allowance upon re-employment with a public authority or public benefit corporation
Summary: Requires the suspension of retirement allowance upon re-employment with a public authority or public benefit corporation.
LawCode: Amd §150, Civ Serv L; amd §§211 & 212, R & SS L; amd §13-178, NYC Ad Cd; amd §1117, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, the retirement and social security law, the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city charter, in relation to suspension of retirement allowance upon re-employment with a public authority or public benefit corporation
